news.title: OpenAI Launches GPT-5 With 94.6% Math Benchmark Score
news.excerpt: GPT-5 leads with 94.6% AIME 2025 math score, 88.4% on GPQA tests, and Intelligence Index of 69. Features 'team of experts' architecture for deep reasoning.

news.title: Tesla Optimus v3 Targets 100K Monthly Production
news.excerpt: Tesla unveils Optimus v3 with hyper-realistic hands featuring 22 degrees of freedom, double that of v2. Streamlined design with concealed mechanics.

news.title: Anthropic Claude Opus 4.1 Achieves 74.5% SWE-bench Score
news.excerpt: Claude Opus 4.1 offers competitive coding abilities with most recent knowledge cutoff of July 2025 among competitors.

news.title: Google Gemini 2.5 Pro Features 1M Token Context
news.excerpt: Gemini 2.5 Pro analyzes up to 1,500 pages with native multimodality for text, images, audio, and video simultaneously.

news.title: Boston Dynamics Electric Atlas Shows Dynamic Movement
news.excerpt: Electric Atlas demonstrates high-performance movement with exceptional balance and agility using advanced electric actuators.

news.title: Figure AI Demonstrates Humanoid Robot Folding Laundry
news.excerpt: Figure AI's humanoid robot successfully demonstrates complex manipulation tasks including folding laundry autonomously.

news.title: xAI Reaches $200B Valuation With $10B Funding
news.excerpt: Elon Musk's xAI secured $10B at $200B valuation using hybrid debt-equity structure, achieving 20x pricing power.

news.title: OpenAI Secures Record $140B Total 2025 Funding
news.excerpt: OpenAI raised $40B at $300B valuation, with Nvidia planning $100B investment for AI infrastructure.

news.title: China Hosts First Humanoid Robot Games
news.excerpt: China launches inaugural Humanoid Robot Games showcasing latest advances in bipedal robotics and AI control.

news.title: Unitree G1 and Agility Digit Lead Humanoid Market
news.excerpt: Unitree Robotics' G1 and Agility Robotics' Digit emerge as leading commercial humanoid platforms.

Humanoid robots enter commercial production at scale
AI reasoning capabilities reach human-level performance

Autonomous vehicles dominate transportation in major cities
General-purpose robots work alongside humans in factories
